name: EyePet & Friends
description: Everybody’s favorite furball is back…and, this time, he’s bringing along another fun-loving friend! In EyePet™ & Friends, you use the PlayStation®Eye camera and PlayStation®Move motion controller to nurture and play with multiple EyePets for endless hours of mischievous fun. You can even create brand new toys and activities, and then share them with friends in the new EyePet™ online community!
